title: With federal research funding uncertain, states debate new science initiatives
description: A handful of states are considering initiatives to increase funding for scientific research as uncertainty around federal dollars has grown.
content: A handful of states are considering initiatives to increase funding for scientific research as uncertainty around federal dollars has grown.
